ygData.subject: Re: Rivervale to Qeynos?
ygData.msgSnippet: Stay in Rivervale and kill bixie drones and gobbie workers until you get a few levels. (If money gets to be a problem, once you get Selo s at 5th, go to Qeynos
ygData.messageBody:
Stay in Rivervale and kill bixie drones and gobbie workers until you get a
few levels. (If money gets to be a problem, once you get Selo's at 5th, go
to Qeynos and do the mail run from Qeynos to Surefall. It'll get you a
nicce bit of gold for your lvl) You should be able to hang out in Misty
Thicket til you hit 14 or 15 (If I remember correctly).

-=B=-
The Rathe
19th Season of Bardic Training
Getting 12gp per One-way run on the Qeynos-HPH run :o)
